query.name: equipment_get_all
query.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT &ifp_equipment;.*, &ifp_equipment;_type.name, &ifp_equipment;_type.equipment_type_id, (&ifp_locations;.name) as location_address_name, &ifp_locations;.location_id
FROM (&ifp_equipment;, &ifp_equipment;_type, &ifp_locations;)
LEFT JOIN &ifp_location_equipment; ON (&ifp_locations;.location_id=&ifp_location_equipment;.location_id)
WHERE &ifp_equipment;.equipment_type_id=&ifp_equipment;_type.equipment_type_id AND &ifp_location_equipment;.equipment_id=&ifp_equipment;.equipment_id ORDER BY &ifp_locations;.name, &ifp_equipment;_type.name
